name: Dragonknight
about: These skillful masters-at-arms use the ancient Akaviri martial arts tradition of battle-spirit, and wield fearsome magic that pounds, shatters and physically alters the world around them.

skills.name: Ardent Flame
skills.description: Ardent Flame is geared towards fire damage.

skills.name: Draconic Power
skills.description: Draconic Power is geared mainly towards self-preservation and tanking.

skills.name: Earthen Heart
skills.description: Earthen Heart is a mix of self-defense and support abilities.

name: Nightblade
about: Nightblades are adventurers and opportunists with a gift for getting in and out of trouble. Relying variously on stealth, blades, and speed, Nightblades thrive on conflict and misfortune, trusting to their luck and cunning to survive.

skills.name: Assassination
skills.description: The Assassination skill is orientated towards melee attackers, particularly dual-wielding, with abilities ranging from increasing your attack speed to teleporting to your target and damaging them at the same time.

skills.name: Shadow
skills.description: The Shadow skill is orientated towards self-preservation, with abilities ranging from inflicting fear on nearby enemies to becoming invisible and some crowd-control.

skills.name: Siphoning
skills.description: The Siphoning skill is oriented towards spell-casting assassins, with abilities that de-buff and damage enemies and provide healing and positive buffs to you. These abilities range from decreasing nearby enemies' attack power to casting a damage-over-time spell on a target that casts a healing spell on you for the same duration.

name: Sorcerer
about: Sorcerers can use conjuration and destruction spells to hurl lightning bolts and create shock fields, wield dark magic to snare and stun, and summon Daedric combat followers from Oblivion to assist them.

skills.name: Dark Magic
skills.description: Dark Magic is one of three class skill lines available to Sorcerer characters. Skills in this line focus on stuns and utility spells and are good for a supporting role.

skills.name: Daedric Summoning
skills.description: Daedric Summoning is one of three class skill lines available to Sorcerer characters. This is very similar to Conjuration in that you summon Daedric creatures, such as atronachs and familiars.

skills.name: Storm Calling
skills.description: Storm Calling is one of three class skill lines available to Sorcerer characters. Skills in this line focus on magical DPS (damage per second) and burst damage, mostly themed towards lightning magic.

name: Templar
about: These traveling knights call upon the powers of light and the burning sun to deal massive damage to their enemies while restoring health, magicka, and stamina to their allies.

skills.name: Aedric Spear
skills.description: Aedric Spear uses the power of light to deal damage at any range and protect the caster with a powerful shield.

skills.name: Dawn's Wrath
skills.description: Dawn's Wrath represents the power of the sun, using light and fire to damage enemies directly, assist allies with their damage, or reflecting enemy damage.

skills.name: Restoring Light
skills.description: Restoring Light is focused towards magical support and strong healing abilities.

name: Warden
about: Wardens are defenders of the Green, master storytellers whose nature tales become magical reality. They wield frost spells against enemies and summon animals to aid them.

skills.name: Animal Companions
skills.description: Animal Companions is geared towards summoning animals to aid you in battle.

skills.name: Green Balance
skills.description: Green Balance is geared towards healing and buffs.

skills.name: Winter's Embrace
skills.description: Winter's Embrace is geared towards dealing Frost Damage and tanking.

name: Necromancer
about: Masters of death, Necromancers can call upon corpses to serve as undead thralls and weave ghastly spells to both harm and heal.

skills.name: Grave Lord
skills.description: Grave Lord is elemental magic skill with pure damage dealing abilities.

skills.name: Bone Tyrant
skills.description: Bone Tyrant is a set of abilities focused towards defense and tanking.

skills.name: Living Death
skills.description: Living Death is a mix of healing and resurrecting abilities.
